content: the sakura kimono bunny is a lovely rabbit doll wearing a traditional japanese dress her outfit includes a kimono with an obi sash and sandals she also wears sakura cherry blossom flowers on her head have fun customizing this crochet project with different color combinations and crochet her as the perfect handmade gift here is a finished product preview of this amigurumi project https //youtu be/djjg2-xjym4 supplies medium weight 4 yarn in desired colors i used furls whims merino in white pink and lavender 3 25 mm hook 4 mm hook for flowers only oval plastic safety eyes size 8x11mm fiberfill stuffing yarn needle * scissors abbreviations fo fasten_off magic_ring magic_ring chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch surface slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet fsc foundation single_crochet fdc foundation double_crochet increase increase decrease decrease double_crochet-decrease double_crochet decrease double_crochet-increase double_crochet increase blo back loops only dimensions height 11 inches 28 cm
